name: Direct-Tions
description:
A Simple, yet Fast-Paced game which tests your ability to choose the answer, whether it's up, below, eastern, or even it's color green without getting thrown off by what your reflex, or your mind dictates, within a small period of time.

MODES INCLUDE:
  • CLASSIC - Mark your highest score within 20 seconds! Keep on following direct-Tions quickly without getting a single mistake or let the time run out. Reach "Fever" to restore time and extend the game.
  • TIME ATTACK - A more faster game mode for those with quicker reflexes. Survive 2 Seconds (And decaying!) without letting it run out. Wrong answers DO NOT end your game but it will reduce the time faster.
  • SPLIT-SCREEN VERSUS- Coming Soon!

Available for Android (minimum ver Kitkat 4.1) with 16:9 Portrait Resolution.

Work in progress! This Game is still currently in development. Updates will come periodically. Made in Unity3D.
